item.description:
The Nutmeg Big Brothers/Big Sisters (BBBS) Program is having its annual Bowl for Kids' Sake on Saturday, March 24. There are bowl-a-thons at 3 different locations in CT that day, but EDEMG members will be at the one held at Willi Bowl in Willimantic. Bowling "shifts" are at 1pm and 3pm.

If you are not familiar with BBBS, it is a great mentoring program for children who come from situations in which there is a single parent, a divorced home, or a troubled home in general. I have been a Big Sister for the past 3 years, and it has been an incredibly awarding experience. I am serving on the planning committee for the Eastern Nutmeg BBBS region's Bowl for Kids' Sake this year.

At the end of 2006, Nutmeg BBBS (along with many other CT agencies) was informed that they would not be receiving their usual $300,000 grant from the State in 2007. This is about 1/6 of the agency's budget. As a result, the Bowl For Kids' Sake is an especially important event this year. We hope that you will either participate in the Bowl-a-thon or will support other EDEMG bowlers through sponsorship. Kenny T. and Michelle already plan to bowl several strikes at this event!

SPARE the time for three simple steps to join us!

If you would like to bowl:

1) Register in advance (online at www.nutmegbigbrothersbigsisters.org, or contact Michelle for a Sign-up Form). Bring a friend or form a team. A team can be 4-5 bowlers. Ask your family, friends, and co-workers - anyone you know - to join you.
2) Spread the word, raise money, and get others involved! When you sign up online, you can create your own web page and email your friends. A link in your email allows them to charge a contribution online through a secure site.

Each bowler must raise or contribute the minimum contribution fee.
-Adults: Raise or contribute $75.00 or more
-NBBBS Mentors and Bigs: Raise or contribute $50 or more
-Student: Raise or contribute $40.00 or more
-Littles (Kids with NBBBS mentors): Free when accompanied by an adult.

3) Enjoy a day of fun to BOWL you over! Each registered bowler plays two games and will receive a t-shirt, shoes rental, pizza and soda. There will also be raffles, music and prizes!

We hope that several EDEMG teams are formed to take on the organizers (bring it!), or that you will consider sponsoring a team.

To sponsor Kenny T. and Michelle's team, The Big Lebowskis, use this link:Team Page
